Html:
Hello Mark, Can you explain me why you use 3 buffers for recording in WaveInEvent class? I'm thinking that you can use 2 buffers and switch them and not loose data.But why 3?

Thank you

that comes from ages ago (2002), when I started NAudio and I was struggling for performance. I've changed the default to 2 for WaveOut - I thought I'd done if for WaveIn as well. It's less confusing working with two buffers as well.

Thank you for your quick answear:)

If I change it to 2 in my project, it should work well without modifying other parts?
sorry now I see that this buffers is public:) and don t have to change anything in naudio
there's a public NumberOfBuffers property, so just set it to 2 immediately after creating WaveInEvent
